requirements.summary: Build dashboard interface with PowerBI-style data visualizations
acceptanceCriteria: Visualizations update based on bot data processing

file_operations.description: Create Dashboard component displaying PowerBI-style visualizations including charts, graphs, and key metrics. Fetch bot configurations and data sources from backend using getAllBotConfigs() and getAllDataSources(). Implement responsive grid layout for visualization cards. Include header using generated image frontend/public/assets/generated/dashboard-header.dim_1200x300.png as background.
Create MetricCard component to display individual key performance indicators with title, value, and trend indicator. Use corporate color palette (charcoal, emerald green, white) for styling.

Create DataVisualization component as a container for chart rendering. Accept data prop and visualization type (bar, line, pie). Implement using HTML5 canvas or SVG for rendering charts based on AIQuery results from bot configurations.
Import and integrate Dashboard component into main App routing. Set Dashboard as default landing page. Wrap with Layout component for consistent structure.

requirements.summary: Create chat interface for bot interaction and data queries

file_operations.description: Create ChatInterface component with message list, input field, and send button. Display bot avatar using generated image frontend/public/assets/generated/bot-avatar.dim_128x128.png. Implement conversation history state management. Call getBotConfig() to retrieve query results and display as bot responses. Style with corporate color palette.

Create ChatMessage component to render individual messages with sender identification (user/bot), timestamp, and message content. Apply different styling for user vs bot messages using charcoal and emerald green theme colors.

Create useChat hook to manage chat state including message history, sending messages, and processing bot responses. Integrate with backend getBotConfig() to fetch relevant query results matching user input.
Add route for ChatInterface component. Include navigation link in Layout sidebar. Ensure chat is accessible from Dashboard.

requirements.summary: Implement data upload and import functionality for bot analysis
acceptanceCriteria: Data validation is performed on upload

file_operations.description: Create DataUpload component with file input, drag-and-drop zone, and upload progress indicator. Use the blob-storage component to support file uploads via ExternalBlob.fromBytes() with withUploadProgress() for tracking upload progress. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing. Validate file types (CSV, JSON, Excel) before upload. Call addDataSource() to register uploaded data with backend.

Create DataSourceList component to display all imported data sources. Fetch data using getAllDataSources() backend method. Show data source name, upload date, and status. Include delete and refresh actions.
Add route for DataUpload component. Include navigation link in Layout sidebar. Make data upload accessible before using chat or dashboard features.

requirements.summary: Design professional data-analytics visual theme with corporate styling
acceptanceCriteria: Consistent color scheme across all components
Layout prioritizes data visualization and clarity
Professional appearance suitable for business users

file_operations.description: Update global styles with corporate color palette (charcoal as primary dark, emerald green as accent, white as background). Define CSS custom properties for consistent theming. Enhance typography for data readability with clear font hierarchy. Add utility classes for data-focused layouts.

Extend Tailwind configuration with custom corporate color palette: charcoal (#2C3E50), emerald green (#2ECC71), and supporting shades. Configure typography plugin for improved data readability. Add custom spacing and border radius values for business intelligence UI patterns.

Create Layout component providing consistent structure across application with header, sidebar navigation, and main content area. Apply corporate branding and professional styling. Include navigation to Dashboard, Chat, and Data Upload sections.
